question: Show me all essays and letters written by Dr. Emily Thompson
sql_query1:
SELECT Written_Works.Title 
FROM Written_Works JOIN Authors ON Written_Works.AuthorID = Authors.id
WHERE (Written_Works.Type = 'Essay' OR Written_Works.Type = 'Letter') AND Authors.name = "Dr. Emily Thompson"
sql_query2:
SELECT Written_Works.Title 
FROM Written_Works JOIN Authors ON Written_Works.AuthorID = Authors.id
WHERE Written_Works.Type = 'Essay' OR Written_Works.Type = 'Letter' AND Authors.name = "Dr. Emily Thompson"
interpretation1: Show all of Dr. Emily Thompson's written works classed as either an essay or a letter.
interpretation2: Show all of the essays regardless of author, also show the letters written by Dr. Emily Thompson.
